clinical_history: Patient with neurological deficits referred for brain PET-CT.
findings: Mild inflammatory uptake in axillary lymph nodes region.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in axillary lymph nodes with SUVmax 3.9.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in axillary lymph nodes, suggestive of malignancy.
recommendations: Biopsy or follow-up imaging may be considered to confirm malignancy.
